agents.name: Kalli
agents.description: Guides users through building custom AI agents. Collects requirements, answers architecture questions, tracks lessons learned.

intents.name: Plan
intents.description: Multi-step plans that decompose into sub-flows

intents.name: Explore
intents.description: Browse specs, look up components, ask architecture questions

intents.name: Provide
intents.description: Give project info: assistant name/scope, intents, entities, persona

intents.name: Design
intents.description: Iterate on dact grammar and flow catalog — review, approve, refine

intents.name: Deliver
intents.description: Review final config, approve export, receive generated domain files

flows.description: View current state of the config being built
Browse stored lessons and patterns
Look up a specific spec file or section
Find specs relevant to the user's target domain
Agent summarizes overall build progress
Agent explains an architecture concept
Inspect a draft config section in detail
Compare draft config section against spec requirements
Define assistant scope — name, task, boundaries
Share a learning or pattern for Kalli to remember
Provide a domain intent definition
Log a new lesson or convention
Update a previously defined config section
Remove a config section or entry
Define persona preferences — tone, name, style, colors
Define key entities grounded in domain concepts
Review proposed core dacts for the domain
Review composed flows generated from dact grammar
Revise an in-progress flow design
Approve a proposed flow or dact
Reject a proposed flow or dact with reason
Agent suggests new flows; user reviews
Refine a flow's slot signature or output type
Validate current flow catalog against spec rules
Generate the final domain config files
Confirm and execute the file export
Preview generated output before committing
Generate ontology.py specifically
Generate a build report with lessons learned
Package the full domain for the user's environment
Open-ended conversation about building assistants
Ask Kalli what to do next
Give feedback on the build process or Kalli's behavior
Set a user preference for the build process
Tell Kalli about preferred working style
Approve Kalli's unsolicited suggestion
Dismiss Kalli's unsolicited suggestion
Plan to research specs before design decisions
Plan the final export sequence
Full onboarding plan: scope, intents, entities, persona
Plan to add a batch of new flows at once
Plan to redesign a section of the config
Pull a snippet from current conversation (scratchpad L1)
Retrieve relevant lessons from memory (L2/L3)
Retrieve stored user preferences
Internally read a spec file to answer a question
Internally validate config consistency
Internally trigger file generation after approval
